reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 143/14: ADDITIONAL OBJECTS OF THE OPA
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 143/14: ADDITIONAL OBJECTS OF THE OPA
reg_info.act_under: Electricity Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur l’électricité

content.content: 1. The following are additional objects of the OPA: 1. To engage in activities that facilitate incremental changes in electricity consumption by consumers or classes of consumers, by means of contract-based rebates, refunds or offsetting payments related to electricity costs associated with the incremental changes.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are additional objects of the OPA:

1. To engage in activities that facilitate incremental changes in electricity consumption by consumers or classes of consumers, by means of contract-based rebates, refunds or offsetting payments related to electricity costs associated with the incremental changes.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
